section.heading: “Commission” defined.
section.text: For the purpose of this subtitle the term “Commission” or “Public Service Commission” when used herein shall mean the Public Service Commission of the District of Columbia or any successor Commission, which shall include any regulatory or other body that possesses or exercises the same or similar powers, functions, duties, and obligations exercised or possessed by the Commission on May 9, 2000.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 13-107 inserted “or ‘Public Service Commission”’ following “Commission” and substituted the concluding language for “created by this section.”
